name: Running Red
description:
Running Red is a 2D autoscroller, made for a couple of reasons.

Firstly, I wanted to dust off my ability to actually make games, since I haven't really tried at all in about nine years. Secondly, I've started a YouTube channel called "Let's Talk Game Design", and doing a deep analysis of Running Red helped to outline and illustrate some of what I consider the 'fundamentals' of game design theory.

If you want to watch the video that this game features in, you can find it below.

It is, of course, just an autorunner. But that's okay! I hope you enjoy it.
